articles.title: The Nikkei: Nintendo Switch 2 in line for 145% tariff hit - My Nintendo News
articles.description: The Nikkei is reporting this morning that the looming trade war will see the Nintendo Switch 2 hit with a 145% in tariffs when it launches on 5th June. This won’t just affect Nintendo as all major…

articles.title: This Was Bound to Happen, an AI Tries to Rewrite Its Own Code… Towards an Out-of-Control Intelligence? - The Daily Galaxy
articles.description: An advanced Japanese AI quietly tried to rewrite its own code—just to run a bit longer. Developers were caught off guard by what seemed like a small tweak with big implications.

articles.title: Samsung pauses One UI 7 rollout worldwide - The Verge
articles.description: Samsung has reportedly paused the rollout of its One UI 7 update on Galaxy S24, Z Fold 6, and Z Flip 6 phones following the discovery of a bug.

articles.title: PS5 price jumps £40 as Sony cites 'challenging' market conditions - BBC
articles.description: The digital, disc-free edition of Sony's console has increased by roughly £70 since it first went on sale.

articles.title: Galaxy S25 Ultra's Pitaka PinButton case adds three physical customisable buttons - SamMobile
